SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
 
Base
The Base class represents a base in the game.
BasePowerUp
The BasePowerUp class is a specific power-up class, which extends the PowerUp class, that implements the functiontality required to have a "base" power-up.
Board
The Board class represents the game board.
BoardPanel
 
Dice
 
DrawGamePanel
 
DrawMenuPanel
 
Entity
The Entity class is an abstract class that acts as the parent class for all entities on the board (pieces and power-ups).
EntityFactory
The EntityFactory class is a factory class that creates entities (pieces and different power-ups).
EntityVisitor
 
FieldState
The FieldState class represents the state of a piece when it is on the field.
Game
The Game class is the root of the application that is responsible for the game logic.
GameController
 
GameState
The GameState class is the superclass of the different states of the game.
GameWindow
 
Goal
The Goal class represents the goal tile in the game that the pieces are trying to reach.
GoalStretch
The GoalStretch class represents the goal stretch in the game (each player has their own strip of tiles) that the pieces have to go through to reach the goal.
GoalStretchState
The GoalState class represents the state of a piece when it has reached the goal stretch.
IBasePowerUpHandler
 
IInsertable
The IInsertable interface represents an object that can insert and remove a piece into/from a tile or goal.
ILaserPowerUpHandler
 
ILightningPowerUpHandler
 
IMoveHandler
 
LaserPowerUp
The LaserPowerUp class is a specific power-up class, which extends the PowerUp class, that implements the functiontality required to have a "laser" power-up.
LeftPanel
 
LightningPowerUp
The LightningPowerUp class is a specific power-up class, which extends the PowerUp class, that implements the functiontality required to have a "lightning" power-up.
MenuWindow
 
MoveState
 
Observable
 
Observer
 
PaintableBase
 
PaintableBaseListener
This class is used to listen to the PaintableBase objects.
PaintableEntityFactory
 
PaintablePiece
 
PaintablePieceListener
This class is used to listen to the PaintablePiece objects.
PaintablePowerUp
 
PaintableTile
 
PaintableTileFactory
 
Piece
The Piece class represents a piece on the board.
PieceExtractor
The PieceExtractor interface represents an object that can extract a piece from the goal stretch and move it back to the field.
PieceState
The PieceState interface represents whether the piece is on the field or on the piece's goal stretch.
PowerUp
The PowerUp class is an abstract class that extends the Entity class.
PowerUpGenerator
 
RemoveFromFieldVisitor
 
RightPanel
 
RollDiceListener
This class is used to listen to the RollDiceButton.
RollState
The RollState class is a subclass of GameState.
StringObservable
 
StringObserver
 
Tile
The Tile class represents a tile on the board.
WindowController
